Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence to support the assertion that the White House is enraged because Obama was invited to the royal wedding and Trump was denied.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Obama was invited to the wedding and Trump was denied, without any factual basis.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the emotions and reaction of the White House, stating that it is erupting in rage.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the guest list for the royal wedding has not been made public, and there is no evidence to support the claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing accurate information and relies on speculative and click-bait headlines.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in the claim.
